name: part_008
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY1】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE2【チラ見せ】 [4C3kreEOk1Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Multi-person performance of the hololive 6th fes. theme song.
Transition and stage setup for Omaru Polka's solo performance.
Solo performance of "POWPOWPOW" by Omaru Polka.
Solo performance of "GEKIDOU" by Hakos Baelz.

subtitles.original: We are with you
subtitles.english: We are with you

subtitles.original: はじまり 未来色を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to see the colors of the beginning and the future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: We are with you, capture the moment
subtitles.english: We are with you, capture the moment

subtitles.original: その先まで 続く空に紛れたら
subtitles.english: If I blend into the sky that stretches beyond...

subtitles.original: 君の場所と 今を繋ぎたくて
subtitles.english: I want to connect where you are with the now

subtitles.original: あの涙が 今の僕らを繋げて
subtitles.english: Those tears connect us now

subtitles.original: この心に 君の欠片がいるから
subtitles.english: Because fragments of you are in this heart

subtitles.original: 強くなってもいい 今の光を
subtitles.english: It's okay to become stronger, the light of now

subtitles.original: 僕ら集め 空に放つ
subtitles.english: We gather it and release it to the sky

subtitles.original: この軌跡を 僕らずっと輝かせるから
subtitles.english: Because we'll make this miracle shine forever

subtitles.original: 咲かせよう ここから
subtitles.english: Let it bloom from here

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because you're not alone

subtitles.original: We are with you!
subtitles.english: We are with you!

subtitles.original: POW POW POW POW POW POW POW POW POW POW
subtitles.english: POW POW POW POW POW POW POW POW POW POW

subtitles.original: やっほー！ポルカだよ～
subtitles.english: Yahoo! It's Polka!

subtitles.original: ってあれ、出オチじゃねーかって？
subtitles.english: Wait, you're saying that's a predictable opening?

subtitles.original: とりあえず声出して、いくぞ～～～！
subtitles.english: First of all, make some noise! Here we go!

subtitles.original: お～ありがとなお調子！
subtitles.english: Oh, thanks for the energy!

subtitles.original: センキュー幕張！
subtitles.english: Thank you, Makuhari!

subtitles.original: Na na na na... Ready for the show?
subtitles.english: Na na na na... Ready for the show?

subtitles.original: Okay, 激動独壇場
subtitles.english: Okay, the Gekidou monopoly stage

subtitles.original: Let's go, let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go, let's go!

subtitles.original: Na na na na... Ready for the show?
subtitles.english: Na na na na... Ready for the show?

subtitles.original: カバケ！
subtitles.english: Go wild!

subtitles.original: Ya ya ya ya SHOW TIME!
subtitles.english: Ya ya ya ya SHOW TIME!

subtitles.original: 底辺のなりおりゃおいえ
subtitles.english: Lowering myself down, here we go

subtitles.original: 良い子コンピどうりゃ oh hell yeah
subtitles.english: Good child competition, oh hell yeah

subtitles.original: 段々ノリノリで上等 bam bam bam bam!
subtitles.english: Getting more and more excited, bam bam bam bam!

subtitles.original: エモい笑えない 宴の Party Stop
subtitles.english: Emotional and speechless, the party stops here
